lines.text: Enter RATCLIFF, with halberds, carrying RIVERS, GREY, and VAUGHAN to death

lines.speaker: rivers
lines.text: Sir Richard Ratcliff, let me tell thee this: Today shalt thou behold a subject die For truth, for duty, and for loyalty.

lines.speaker: grey
lines.text: God keep the prince from all the pack of you! A knot you are of damned bloodsuckers!

lines.speaker: vaughan
lines.text: You live that shall cry woe for this after.

lines.speaker: ratcliff
lines.text: Dispatch the limit of your lives is out.

lines.speaker: rivers
lines.text: O Pomfret, Pomfret! O thou bloody prison, Fatal and ominous to noble peers! Within the guilty closure of thy walls Richard the second here was hackd to death And, for more slander to thy dismal seat, We give thee up our guiltless blood to drink.

lines.speaker: grey
lines.text: Now Margarets curse is falln upon our heads, For standing by when Richard stabbd her son.

lines.speaker: rivers
lines.text: Then cursed she Hastings, then cursed she Buckingham, Then cursed she Richard. O, remember, God To hear her prayers for them, as now for us And for my sister and her princely sons, Be satisfied, dear God, with our true blood, Which, as thou knowst, unjustly must be spilt.

lines.speaker: ratcliff
lines.text: Make haste the hour of death is expiate.

lines.speaker: rivers
lines.text: Come, Grey, come, Vaughan, let us all embrace: And take our leave, until we meet in heaven.
